title: Representative Learning Design (RLD) Workshop for Elite Sports Training Environment Design

context.prior_knowledge: General Understanding of Fundamental Sports Education Theory and Training Environment Design
context.additional_context: Training environment design methods applying ecological dynamics theory for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: They can explain the principles of designing training environments based on ecological dynamics theory
They can develop real-world sports training scenarios using Representative Learning Design (RLD)
They can present data-driven training environment optimization strategies in project format
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
